title: Aurora CEO Chris Urmson on building the roadmap to fully autonomous vehicles | E1228
description: Chris Urmson the CEO of Aurora, a leading self-driving company, joins Jason to recount the history of autonomous vehicles (1:06), the roadmap for removing human drivers (16:47), what technology problems are left to solve (38:25) and more!
